requirement: The system shall use secure sockets in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
The system shall confirm all transactions with the customer�s web browser.
The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer�s computer containing the user�s password.
The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer�s computer containing any of the user�s confidential information.
The customer�s web browser shall never display a customer�s password.  It shall always be echoed with special characters representing typed characters.
The customer�s web browser shall never display a customer�s credit card number after retrieving from the database.  It shall always be shown with just the last 4 digits of the credit card number.
The system�s back-end servers shall never display a customer�s password.  The customer�s password may be reset but never shown
The system�s back-end servers shall only be accessible to authenticated administrators.
The system�s back-end databases shall be encrypted.
The system requires the patient to identify himself /herself using PHN
Any user who uses the system shall have a Logon ID and Password
Any modification  (Insert, Delete, Update) for the Database shall be synchronized and done only by the administrator in the ward
Front Desk staff shall be able to view all information in HPIMS add new patients to HPIMS but shall not be able to modify any information in it
Administrators shall be able to view and modify all information in HPIMS
In the event of a system crash during a transaction the current transaction will either completed or not completed. This will be handled by an already existing database
The system must effectively recover from a crash within five seconds.  For the system to effectively recover it must be able to restart a sessions with the user within the time limit
Sensitive data is protected from unwanted access by user�s appropriate technology and implementing strict user-access criteria
Facility of unique user number and Password in such a way that unauthorized user cannot log in
Operational rights for each user/terminal can be defined
Operational rights for each user/terminal can be defined
The system shall enable user to select multiple options on the screen to search.
The customer account will require name, address, date of birth, driver’s License and credit card number.
The system shall display all the available components of the product to configure
The System will contain a Customer Service module that will allow Store and Corporate employees� access to the system for the purpose of Creating Rental Agreements
The System will contain a Customer Service module that will allow Store and Corporate employees to collect payments
The system is also designed to be user-friendly
Admin can manage all users and maintain their data securely He can update the details and day to day updating can be done by admin
The system shall display detailed information of the selected products.
The HPIMS shall allow the user to update any of the patient�s information as described in SRS
The system will display only vehicles that are currently available to rent to the customer during the rental process
With the information provided by administrator user can directly contact with system or he can contact during their chat.
User can ask any questions with the system and server during their chat
The system will display account outstanding balances.
The system will provide employees with a screen view of all customer pickups for a specified day
System can give the suggestions to the users during their discussion in discussion forum. He /She will give the traffic details. For participating in discussion forum he/she has to be registered.
The system shall maintain customer email information as a required part of customer profile.
The user should have a valid user id and password
The system shall display all the available financing options.
Administrator can maintain all backup data
The HPIMS shall generate reports on patients about the following information: patient’s Phone Number, patient’s name, ward name bed number and the doctor’s name which was assigned
The HPIMS shall generate reports on bed availability about the following information: ward name, bed number, occupied/unoccupied
